about.title: Our Vision
about.content: This conference aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers, and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of biological sciences. It also provides a premier interdisciplinary platform for researchers, practitioners, and educators to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, and concerns as well as practical challenges encountered and solutions adopted in the fields of biological sciences for sustainable development.

about.title: The Organizing Department
about.content: The Department of Microbiology and Biotechnology, established in 1976 at Gujarat University, is a dynamic organization offering M.Sc., M.Phil., and Ph.D. programs in Microbiology and Biotechnology. Our faculty specializes in diverse fields such as systematic bacteriology, industrial and environmental microbial technology, Plant and Soil Microbiology, Biofortification, Biofertilizer, Biocontrol Mechanisms, and Bioremediation. Recognized with the DST-FIST Grant for research excellence, we are committed to shaping the future of students by building bridges with industry and connecting various disciplines, institutions, and the community.

themes.description: Advances in medical and pharmaceutical biotechnology.

themes.title: Biosolutions for environmental sustainability
themes.description: Using biology to tackle environmental challenges.

themes.title: Ethical AI in biological science
themes.description: Exploring the intersection of artificial intelligence and ethics in biology.
